A Journey Rooted in Social Justice

The story of MetaCurious begins with a personal journey rooted in social justice, personal development, and ethical leadership. Our coaching practice emerged from a deep commitment to supporting leaders who are working to create more equitable and just communities.

Background & Experience

With extensive experience in leadership development, social justice advocacy, and transformative coaching, our practice draws on:

  • Social Justice Frameworks: Deep understanding of systemic inequality and strategies for dismantling oppressive systems
  • Leadership Development: Years of experience supporting emerging and established leaders
  • Coaching Expertise: Professional training in transformative coaching methodologies
  • Community Building: Facilitation of peer learning circles and group supervision sessions

Coaching Approach

Our coaching is:

  • Person-Centered: Tailored to your unique context, challenges, and aspirations
  • Justice-Focused: Grounded in principles of equity, inclusion, and liberation
  • Action-Oriented: Moving from insight to meaningful, sustainable change
  • Holistic: Integrating personal growth with systemic transformation

Values & Commitments

The coaching relationship at MetaCurious is built on:

  • Ethics & Integrity: Maintaining the highest standards of professional practice
  • Confidentiality: Creating safe space for vulnerability and growth
  • Cultural Humility: Ongoing learning about identity, privilege, and power
  • Accessibility: Offering sliding scale pricing to ensure coaching is available to those who need it most

Areas of Expertise

  • Leadership development for social change
  • Diversity, Equity, Inclusion, Justice, and Belonging (DEIJB)
  • Organizational transformation
  • Conflict resolution and relationship building
  • Personal and professional sustainability
  • Ethical decision-making in complex contexts

Why Choose MetaCurious?

If you’re an emerging leader committed to social equity, seeking to develop your capacity for transformative change, and looking for a coaching partnership that honors both your personal growth and your justice commitments, MetaCurious offers the support and guidance you need.

Interested in working together? Learn about our services or get in touch.

item.title: Coaching Services
item.description:
MetaCurious offers specialized coaching services designed to empower emerging leaders and change-makers. Our coaching is tailored to your unique needs and grounded in principles of social justice, equity, and transformative leadership.

Three Coaching Streams

Leadership Coaching

Unlock Your Leadership Potential

Leadership coaching at MetaCurious supports you in:

  • Clarifying your leadership vision and values
  • Developing authentic leadership presence
  • Navigating organizational dynamics and politics
  • Building strategic thinking and decision-making skills
  • Enhancing team effectiveness and collaboration
  • Managing change and uncertainty with confidence
  • Sustaining yourself in demanding leadership roles

Ideal for: Emerging and established leaders in nonprofits, social enterprises, educational institutions, and community organizations who want to lead with greater impact and authenticity.

MetaCurious offers specialized coaching services designed to empower emerging leaders and change-makers. Our coaching is tailored to your unique needs and grounded in principles of social justice, equity, and transformative leadership.

Three Coaching Streams

Leadership Coaching

Unlock Your Leadership Potential

Leadership coaching at MetaCurious supports you in:

  • Clarifying your leadership vision and values
  • Developing authentic leadership presence
  • Navigating organizational dynamics and politics
  • Building strategic thinking and decision-making skills
  • Enhancing team effectiveness and collaboration
  • Managing change and uncertainty with confidence
  • Sustaining yourself in demanding leadership roles

Ideal for: Emerging and established leaders in nonprofits, social enterprises, educational institutions, and community organizations who want to lead with greater impact and authenticity.

Social Justice Coaching

Advance Equity and Justice in Your Leadership

Social justice coaching guides you to:

  • Address and dismantle systems of inequality
  • Develop and implement DEIJB (Diversity, Equity, Inclusion, Justice, and Belonging) strategies
  • Navigate power, privilege, and identity in your work
  • Build inclusive, equitable organizational cultures
  • Make ethical decisions in complex situations
  • Sustain your commitment to justice work while preventing burnout
  • Create actionable strategies for transformative change

Our personalized coaching provides deep insights and practical tools for justice-focused initiatives that create lasting impact.

Ideal for: Leaders committed to racial, economic, and social justice who want to deepen their practice and create sustainable, systemic change.

Relationship Coaching

Build Healthy, Equitable Relationships

Relationship coaching focuses on:

  • Strengthening personal and professional relationships
  • Developing healthy communication patterns
  • Navigating conflict with skill and compassion
  • Building emotional intelligence and self-awareness
  • Creating boundaries that honor your needs
  • Repairing relationships after harm
  • Cultivating relationships rooted in justice and equity

Our approach integrates social justice principles with relationship development, recognizing that how we relate to one another is fundamental to creating equitable communities.

Ideal for: Individuals seeking to improve relationships in their personal lives or workplace, with an emphasis on equity, communication, and mutual respect.

Additional Offerings

Group Supervision Sessions

Reflective group sessions for leaders and coaches to advance social justice in their work, addressing DEI issues and fostering collective wisdom.

Peer Learning Circles

Small group settings where leaders deepen liberatory practices, share community wisdom, and build resilient networks of support.

Leadership Learning Labs

Intensive workshops and programs focused on specific aspects of justice-focused leadership development.

Coaching Process

  1. Initial Consultation: Free 30-minute conversation to explore fit and goals
  2. Coaching Agreement: Clarify focus, frequency, and commitment
  3. Regular Sessions: Typically 60-90 minutes, bi-weekly or monthly
  4. Ongoing Support: Email check-ins and resources between sessions
  5. Progress Review: Regular assessment of growth and next steps

Pricing & Accessibility

MetaCurious is committed to making coaching accessible. We offer:

  • Sliding Scale Pricing: Based on your financial capacity
  • Organizational Rates: For groups and leadership teams
  • Scholarship Opportunities: Limited spots for leaders working in under-resourced communities

Pricing details are discussed during the initial consultation to ensure coaching is accessible to you.

Ready to Begin?

If you’re ready to invest in your leadership development and create transformative change, we’d love to hear from you.

Contact us to schedule a free consultation and explore how MetaCurious coaching can support your journey.

item.title: Contact
item.description:
Contact MetaCurious

Let’s Connect

Thank you for your interest in MetaCurious coaching services. Whether you’re ready to begin your coaching journey or simply want to learn more, we’d love to hear from you.

Get in Touch

To inquire about coaching services, schedule a free consultation, or ask questions about our approach:

Email: info@metacurious.ca

Free Consultation

We offer a complimentary 30-minute consultation to:

  • Learn about your goals and challenges
  • Explore whether coaching is a good fit
  • Discuss our coaching approach
  • Answer any questions you may have
  • Clarify logistics, including pricing and scheduling

There’s no obligation, and the conversation is completely confidential.

Contact MetaCurious

Let’s Connect

Thank you for your interest in MetaCurious coaching services. Whether you’re ready to begin your coaching journey or simply want to learn more, we’d love to hear from you.

Get in Touch

To inquire about coaching services, schedule a free consultation, or ask questions about our approach:

Email: info@metacurious.ca

Free Consultation

We offer a complimentary 30-minute consultation to:

  • Learn about your goals and challenges
  • Explore whether coaching is a good fit
  • Discuss our coaching approach
  • Answer any questions you may have
  • Clarify logistics, including pricing and scheduling

There’s no obligation, and the conversation is completely confidential.

What to Expect

When you reach out, you can expect:

  • Prompt Response: We typically respond within 1-2 business days
  • Confidentiality: Your inquiry and all communications are kept confidential
  • No Pressure: Our goal is to determine if coaching is right for you, not to pressure you into a commitment
  • Warmth & Respect: You’ll be met with genuine interest in supporting your journey

Who We Work With

MetaCurious coaching is designed for:

  • Emerging and established leaders in social change work
  • Nonprofit and community organization leaders
  • Social justice advocates and activists
  • Professionals committed to DEI and equity
  • Anyone seeking to lead with greater authenticity and impact

Location & Sessions

Coaching sessions are conducted:

  • Virtual: Via Zoom or phone, accessible from anywhere
  • Flexible Scheduling: Evening and weekend appointments available
  • Accessible: Committed to creating an inclusive coaching environment

Questions?

If you have questions before reaching out, you might find answers on our:

  • Services page - Explore our coaching offerings
  • About the Coach - Meet your coach

We look forward to hearing from you and exploring how MetaCurious can support your leadership journey toward greater equity and justice.
